column4: Today (2025-Jun-22) is Skirophoriṓn 26, πέμπτῃ φθίνοντος Σκιροφοριῶνος, day 352 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2025-Jun-23) is Skirophoriṓn 27, τετράδι φθίνοντος Σκιροφοριῶνος, day 353 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2025-Jun-24) is Skirophoriṓn 28, τρίτῃ φθίνοντος Σκιροφοριῶνος, day 354 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2025-Jun-25) is Skirophoriṓn 29, ἕνῃ καὶ νέᾳ Σκιροφοριῶνος, the last day of 2024/2025!
Today (2025-Jun-26) is Hekatombaiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Ἑκατομβαιῶνος, day 1 of 384. Happy New Year 2025/2026! 🏺🏺🏺

2025/2026 will be an intercalary year of 384 days, ending on 2026-Jul-14. As an intercalary year there will be 13 months (1/2):

Hekatombaiṓn: Jun 26–Jul 24
Metageitniṓn: Jul 25–Aug 23
Boēdromiṓn: Aug 24–Sep 21
Puanopsiṓn: Sep 22–Oct 21
Maimaktēriṓn: Oct 22–Nov 20
Posideiṓn: Nov 21–Dec 20

Months in 2025/2026 (2/2):

Posideiṓn hústeros: Dec 21–Jan 18
Gamēliṓn: Jan 19–Feb 17
Anthestēriṓn: Feb 18–Mar 19
Elaphēboliṓn: Mar 20–Apr 17
Mounukhiṓn: Apr 18–May 16
Thargēliṓn: May 17–Jun 15
Skirophoriṓn: Jun 16–Jul 14
This Hekatombaiṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.

Festivals in Hekatombaiṓn:

7: Hekatombaia (Ἑκατόμβαια)
12: Kronia (Κρόνια)
16: Synoikia (Συνοικία)
28: Panathenaia (Παναθήναια)

🏺 The Hekatombaia (Ἑκατόμβαια), a festival of Apollo which gave its name to this month, was probably celebrated today.\n\n

🏺 On this day Athenians celebrated the Panathenaia (Παναθήναια) with games and a procession (famously depicted in the Parthenon Frieze).\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Panathenaic_Games

Today (2025-Jul-25) is Metageitniṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Μεταγειτνιῶνος, day 30 of 384 in the year 2025/2026.
This Metageitniṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.
Festivals in Metageitniṓn:\n\n15–18: Eleusinia (Ἐλευσινία)
